mapper.insert: insert into PublicProvinceCity (code, name, parentid, IsPublic, JiBie) values (#{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ispublic,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{jibie,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into PublicProvinceCity
code,
name,
parentid,
IsPublic,
JiBie,
#{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ispublic,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{jibie,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update PublicProvinceCity
name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsPublic = #{ispublic,jdbcType=TINYINT},
JiBie = #{jibie,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p.code ProvinceCode , p.name ProvinceName , c.code CityCode , c.name CityName , d.code DistrictCode , d.name DistrictName , d.IsPublic from PublicProvinceCity d with ( nolock ) join PublicProvinceCity c with ( nolock ) on d.parentid = c.code join PublicProvinceCity p with ( nolock ) on c.parentid = p.code where 1 = 1
